hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Umar: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: I wish I had a white loaf made from tawny and softened with clarified butter and milk. A man from among the people got up and getting one brought it. He asked: In which had it been? He replied: In a lizard skin. He said: Take it away. Abu Dawud said: This is a munkar (rejected) tradition. Abu Dawud said: Ayyub, the narrator of this tradition, is not (Ayyub) al-Sakhtiyani

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْجَمْعِ بَيْنَ لَوْنَيْنِ مِنَ الطَّعَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding combining two types of food
